issue.title: gmail.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://gmail.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fgmail.com) ### Comment > Adguard is not blocking ads in the Gmail app in Android 16. Also seeing very weird behavior in Adguard app where the filters list is messed up when you do gesture of Back (tap to go üîô) from a sub section/list it shows a different page ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/m9u3pazxiy8oowk8440osskgk8084ks28j8v02sup8.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/gjw6rvaafhcgg48o8kow4008s00k4owmsnzfej1mg0.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/nir9imnff2808w44kckowowsgk8gcok60m6d5bxgt8.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v4.10 System version: | `Android 16` Browser: | Not a browser but this is Gmail app License type: | paid AdGuard mode: | VPN HTTPS filtering: | enabled Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Self-destructing first-party cookies (4320)

**Miscellaneous**:
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests DNS filtering: | server: `NextDNS`
